import classes from './CartItem.module.css'; import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import { cartActions } from '../../store/cart-slice'; const CartItem = (props) => { const { title, quantity, total, price ,id} = props.item; return (
{title} (ویژه)
تعداد
{quantity} پرس

); }; export default CartItem;
